So how's MRDS selling?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2010 Topics (Year of the Shock Rock): So how's MRDS selling?
By VenomousX on Tuesday, August 17, 2010 - 04:07 pm:

I wanted to know, is there any way for us to find out how well MRDS has been selling? It seems to be hopping over at gameFAQs, which is a good sign.

If it's selling really well, that means there's a good chance for future MR games coming out here right?

By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, August 17, 2010 - 05:58 pm:

The company that releases the weekly figures does so for subscribers who pay a hefty fee for the data. It only gets leaked online sporadically and is usually late.

Some North American companies release figures in press releases or quarterly reports. Most Japanese companies do not. (it falls into an embarrassing/rude area of etiquette involving comparisons which are considered unseemly...)

By VenomousX on Tuesday, August 17, 2010 - 07:50 pm:

Hm.. I see. So we probably won't find out for a while at least. Either way the game seems to be a hit on gamefaqs (mid-review scores, but the message board is 4th on the list)

By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, August 18, 2010 - 07:14 am:

No matter what, we cannot be complacent. If people interact online or in RL with people, they need to recommend it to keep sales up.
